description.zh-cn: 唐朝第9位皇帝，在位44年。在位前期开创了开元盛世，后期因怠政和用人不当导致安史之乱，使唐朝由盛转衰。
description.en: The 9th emperor of the Tang Dynasty, reigning for 44 years. He initiated the Kaiyuan Flourishing Age in his early reign, but his later negligence and poor appointments led to the An-Shi Rebellion, marking the Tang Dynasty's decline from its peak.

description.zh-cn: 唐玄宗李隆基的父亲，曾两度登基为唐朝皇帝。
description.en: Father of Emperor Xuanzong Li Longji, who twice ascended the throne as emperor of the Tang Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 唐玄宗的祖母，中国历史上唯一的女皇帝。
description.en: Emperor Xuanzong's grandmother, the only female emperor in Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 唐玄宗的姑姑。在玄宗即位初期权倾朝野，后在与玄宗的政治斗争中失败被赐死。
description.en: Emperor Xuanzong's aunt. She held immense power during the early years of Xuanzong's reign but was defeated and forced to commit suicide in a political struggle against him.

description.zh-cn: 唐中宗的皇后，企图效法武则天临朝称制，后在唐隆政变中被李隆基所杀。
description.en: Empress of Emperor Zhongzong of Tang. She attempted to emulate Wu Zetian and rule as regent, but was killed by Li Longji during the Tanglong Coup.

description.zh-cn: 唐玄宗的宠妃。安史之乱爆发后，在马嵬驿兵变中被玄宗赐死。
description.en: The beloved consort of Emperor Xuanzong. After the outbreak of the An-Shi Rebellion, she was forced to commit suicide by the emperor during the Mutiny at Mawei Post.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝将领，身兼三镇节度使。后发动安史之乱，严重动摇了唐朝的统治。
description.en: A general of the Tang Dynasty who held the position of military governor (jiedushi) of three commanderies. He later launched the An-Shi Rebellion, which severely destabilized Tang rule.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝宰相，杨贵妃的堂兄。因其专权乱政，与安禄山的矛盾激化，成为安史之乱的导火索之一。在马嵬驿兵变中被杀。
description.en: Chancellor of the Tang Dynasty and cousin of Yang Guifei. His abuse of power and conflict with An Lushan were among the triggers of the An-Shi Rebellion. He was killed during the Mutiny at Mawei Post.

description.zh-cn: 唐玄宗第三子。安史之乱期间在灵武即位，领导平叛。
description.en: The third son of Emperor Xuanzong. He ascended the throne in Lingwu during the An-Shi Rebellion and led the suppression of the revolt.

description.zh-cn: 唐肃宗时期的权宦，曾离间玄宗与肃宗关系，并将身为太上皇的玄宗软禁。
description.en: A powerful eunuch during Emperor Suzong's reign. He sowed discord between Xuanzong and Suzong, and placed Xuanzong, then Taishang Huang, under house arrest.

description.zh-cn: 唐睿宗的妃子，唐玄宗的生母。后被武则天秘密杀害。
description.en: A consort of Emperor Ruizong and the birth mother of Emperor Xuanzong. She was later secretly killed by Wu Zetian.

description.zh-cn: 唐玄宗在位前期，唐朝国力达到顶峰的时期，被认为是中国古代史上的极盛之世。
description.en: The period during the early reign of Emperor Xuanzong when the Tang Dynasty reached its peak of power, considered a golden age in ancient Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 由安禄山和史思明发动的叛乱，对唐朝造成了毁灭性打击，是唐朝由盛转衰的转折点。
description.en: A rebellion launched by An Lushan and Shi Siming, which dealt a devastating blow to the Tang Dynasty and marked its turning point from prosperity to decline.

description.zh-cn: 由李隆基与太平公主联手发动的宫廷政变，旨在铲除企图称帝的韦皇后及其党羽。
description.en: A court coup launched jointly by Li Longji and Princess Taiping to eliminate Empress Wei and her faction, who were attempting to usurp the throne.

description.zh-cn: 唐玄宗为巩固皇权，发动政变消灭了权势强大的太平公主及其势力。
description.en: A coup launched by Emperor Xuanzong to consolidate his power by eliminating the influential Princess Taiping and her faction.

description.zh-cn: 安史之乱中，唐玄宗的出逃部队在马嵬驿发生的兵变。兵变中杨国忠被杀，杨贵妃被赐死。
description.en: A mutiny that occurred at Mawei Post among Emperor Xuanzong's fleeing troops during the An-Shi Rebellion. Yang Guozhong was killed, and Yang Guifei was forced to commit suicide.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一个朝代，被普遍认为是国力最强盛的时代之一。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history, widely regarded as one of the most powerful periods of the nation.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史古都，唐朝时为东都。
description.en: An ancient capital of China, which served as the Eastern Capital during the Tang Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 唐玄宗是唐睿宗的第三子。
description.en: Emperor Xuanzong was the third son of Emperor Ruizong.

description.zh-cn: 唐玄宗的生母是唐睿宗的窦德妃，后追谥为昭成皇后。
description.en: Emperor Xuanzong's birth mother was Consort Dou of Emperor Ruizong, posthumously honored as Empress Zhaocheng.

description.zh-cn: 唐玄宗是武则天的孙子。
description.en: Emperor Xuanzong was the grandson of Wu Zetian.

description.zh-cn: 唐玄宗的生母窦氏因被指控使用巫蛊之术而被武则天秘密处死。
description.en: Emperor Xuanzong's birth mother, Lady Dou, was secretly executed by Wu Zetian after being accused of witchcraft.

description.zh-cn: 杨贵妃是唐玄宗晚年最宠爱的妃子。
description.en: Yang Guifei was Emperor Xuanzong's most beloved consort in his later years.

description.zh-cn: 唐玄宗即位后与试图干政的姑姑太平公主发生权力斗争，最终以玄宗胜利告终。
description.en: After ascending the throne, Emperor Xuanzong engaged in a power struggle with his aunt, Princess Taiping, who tried to interfere in politics, which ended in Xuanzong's victory.

description.zh-cn: 李隆基主动策划并联合太平公主发动唐隆政变，诛杀了韦皇后及其党羽。
description.en: Li Longji proactively planned and, in alliance with Princess Taiping, launched the Tanglong Coup, executing Empress Wei and her faction.

description.zh-cn: 在唐隆政变中，韦皇后被闯入宫中的士兵斩首。
description.en: During the Tanglong Coup, Empress Wei was beheaded by soldiers who stormed the palace.

description.zh-cn: 唐睿宗将皇位禅让给皇太子李隆基。
description.en: Emperor Ruizong abdicated the throne to Crown Prince Li Longji.

description.zh-cn: 为巩固皇权，唐玄宗发动先天政变，彻底清除了太平公主的势力。
description.en: To consolidate his imperial power, Emperor Xuanzong launched the Xiantian Coup, completely eliminating the influence of Princess Taiping.

description.zh-cn: 太平公主在先天政变中图谋废黜玄宗失败，被赐死家中。
description.en: Princess Taiping's plot to depose Xuanzong failed during the Xiantian Coup, and she was forced to commit suicide at home.

description.zh-cn: 唐玄宗在位前期励精图治，任用贤相，革新政治，开创了唐朝的鼎盛时期。
description.en: In his early reign, Emperor Xuanzong's diligent governance, appointment of capable chancellors, and political reforms led to the zenith of the Tang Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 杨国忠与安禄山在朝堂上争宠，互相诋毁，矛盾激化，是安史之乱的导火索之一。
description.en: Yang Guozhong and An Lushan competed for favor at court, slandering each other. Their escalating conflict was one of the triggers for the An-Shi Rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 安禄山以讨伐杨国忠为名，于范阳发动兵变，史称安史之乱。
description.en: An Lushan launched a mutiny in Fanyang under the pretext of punishing Yang Guozhong, known in history as the An-Shi Rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 安史之乱爆发后，唐玄宗仓皇逃往四川，并于途中被迫退位为太上皇。
description.en: After the outbreak of the An-Shi Rebellion, Emperor Xuanzong fled to Sichuan in a hurry and was forced to abdicate and become Taishang Huang (Emperor Emeritus) en route.

description.zh-cn: 安史之乱是唐朝由盛转衰的转折点，严重削弱了中央政府的权力。
description.en: The An-Shi Rebellion was the turning point for the Tang Dynasty from prosperity to decline, severely weakening the power of the central government.

description.zh-cn: 在马嵬驿兵变中，杨国忠被愤怒的士兵所杀。
description.en: During the Mutiny at Mawei Post, Yang Guozhong was killed by enraged soldiers.

description.zh-cn: 在马嵬驿兵变中，为平息军怨，唐玄宗被迫下令赐死杨贵妃。
description.en: During the Mutiny at Mawei Post, Emperor Xuanzong was forced to order the death of Yang Guifei to appease his mutinous troops.

description.zh-cn: 安史之乱中，太子李亨在灵武自行即位，遥尊玄宗为太上皇，实质上结束了玄宗的统治。
description.en: During the An-Shi Rebellion, Crown Prince Li Heng independently ascended the throne in Lingwu, respectfully making Xuanzong the Taishang Huang (Emperor Emeritus), which effectively ended Xuanzong's reign.

description.zh-cn: 在唐肃宗的默许下，李辅国迫使太上皇玄宗迁居太极宫，并隔绝其与旧臣的联系，形同软禁。
description.en: With Emperor Suzong's tacit approval, Li Fuguo forced the Taishang Huang Xuanzong to move to Taiji Palace and cut off his contact with former officials, placing him under de facto house arrest.

description.zh-cn: 李隆基出生于唐朝的东都洛阳。
description.en: Li Longji was born in Luoyang, the Eastern Capital of the Tang Dynasty.
